entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Access denied error when deploy .net maui app by msix on windows #10010
  • Memory leak in collectionview #10007
  • Nested Layout in TitleView of TabbedPage causing System.InvalidCastException: 'Specified cast is not valid.' when navigating back to #10006
  • Content not fitting in Button when using ButtonContentLayout and padding #10005
  • Entry Control: When IsPassword is enabled, the placeholder text font is not the text font assigned to the Entry #10004
  • Blazor Hybrid app started freezing/being unresponsive on latest Android 12 device #10002
  • `Image` inside `Border` is rendered differently in XAML vs. Custom Control #10000
    Backlog
  • Omit portions of xaml from build depending on Debug/Release environement #9999
    Backlog
  • New Shell event when the flyout is moving OnFlyoutMoving #9996
    Backlog
  • Move all SupportedOSPlatformVersion properties into the MAUI targets file #9995
    .NET 8 Planning
  • CollectionView Implement IsHeaderSticky IsFooterSticky property for CollectionView.Header/Footer #9994
    Backlog
  • Error Nu1101 Maui net6.0 Windows Desktop #9993
  • Page.BackgroundImageSource causes artifacts while scrolling #9992
  • Blazor HTML Code Event not working on .Net Maui Blazor App #9987
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .appinstaller file not generated when publishing .Net Maui App #9985
  • Javascript drag & drop does not work when using a WebView control. #9983
  • Problem with publish MAUI Project with reference on iOS platform #9981
  • Support for WindowStyle #9979
    Backlog

Closed

  • Cannot assign permissions for MAUI app in windows #9696
  • maui workloads not installed through visual studio installer #9698
  • Running a .NET MAUI app from VS that was previously built and run takes a surprisingly long time #9700
  • Unhandled exception logging - Urgently needed #9989
  • Add IView.EffectiveFlowDirection #9326
    .NET 7 Planning
  • VS 17.3p3: Border StrokeShape=RoundRectangle fails to draw #8898
  • Publish MAUI Project with reference iOS #9576
  • Platform code is not included in Maui class library project #9079
  • [Bug] FlyoutPage's FlyoutLayoutBehavior value is always 'Split' on Android, causing it unable to manually set IsPresented = false properly #9801
  • Setting View.BackgroundColor = null doesn't reset the color on Android #5973
    Backlog
  • Issue with Razor Class Library in MAUI while publishing the iOS app #8768
    7.0-rc2
  • Shell Windows does not display Tabs added to TabBar at runtime (WinUI3) #9093

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Assert Not Null check on HashCode test #10009
  • Use the new public SkiaSharp #10008
    6.0-sr5
  • Add visual state for PointerEntered #10003
  • Add adorner layer to CoordinatorLayout #10001
  • Lower Catalyst/iOS SupportedOSPlatformVersion #9997
  • Validate image format before resize in Resintetizer #9986
    t/bug, area/single project ☝️
  • Fix AdaptiveTriggers #9984
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, .NET 7 Planning
  • Add Release Schedule doc #9982
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Allow custom layout managers for existing layout types in Controls #9980
    area/layout 🔲

Merged

  • [net6.0][Core]Fixes wrong declared CommandMapper types #9930
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨, 6.0-sr5
  • First load absolute image paths before trying drawables #9926
    area/image :framed_picture:, 6.0-sr5
  • Merge compiler warning fix from main/net7.0 #9925
  • [Housekeeping] Added new Border samples to the Gallery #9676
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix TypeConverters API Docs #9780
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Extensions inline docs #9946
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending Core xml comments #9950
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1293.44 to 1.0.1343.22 #9965
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Remove pipelines check #9914
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fix root page swapping #9955
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, 7.0-rc2
  • [Windows] Fix crash scrolling Shell Flyout list (CollapseOnScroll) #9962
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Enable Graphics API docs generation #9675
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Essentials] Fixes IPreferences DateTime handling #9974
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Update Dispatcher inline docs #9943
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 #9966
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
